title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1732.3 - Nature of audit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1732.3 - Nature of audit

State Regulations

At a minimum, the energy audit shall include an analysis
of the following building features and systems, to identify operational and
maintenance practices and building modifications that will provide energy and
cost savings: (a) infiltration; (b) ventilation; (c) domestic hot
water; (d) heating plant and
distribution; (e) lighting and
electric; (f) insulation; (g) cooling; and
(h) laundry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1732.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
